text: Lee Hong-Koo (born May 9, 1934; Hangul: 이홍구; Hanja: 李洪九) is a former Korean academic and politician. He served as a former Prime Minister of the Republic of Korea, former South Korean Ambassador to the United Kingdom and United States, and founding Chairman of the East Asia Institute in Seoul. ==References== ==Other websites== * Lee Hong-koo Naver Profile Category:Living people Category:1934 births Category:Prime Ministers of South Korea Category:Deputy Prime Ministers of South Korea
title: Lee Hong-koo
